title: Launcher Command Line Arugments Schema
description: The descriptor of Command Line Arguments passed to the launcher application. Arguments can alternatively be provided via command-line options. If updating this file, you must also update Launcher.cpp (Launcher::initArguments())

amend.description: Path to amend file to override parameters

sm_init_timeout.description: stateMachineInitTimeout in secs. 0 for using default value set in SSM framework.

memwatch_frames.description: from-to. Start/stop memwatch only for specified frames during runtime.

navRoute.description: The path for nav route file, either the relative path to 'ndas/apps/roadrunner-2.0/' or absolute path

useDynamicMap.description: Set to 1 to use MapManager map. Overrides <mapPath>.

fullscreen.description: Whether to run in fullscreen or no

autolanechange.description: Enables automatic lane changes. Only allowed for DriveSIM

enable_max_time_diff_check.description: Enable checking sensor timestamp in RoadCast

frame.description: Specify the end camera frame number

loop.description: Set to 1 to play dataset in loop

rc2f.description: File path to save roadcast log file

preInitSerialize.description: Set to 1 to initialize subcomponents serially in PRE_INIT phase

useNominalTransform.description: Set to 1 to use nominal transformation

traceLevel.description: Disables DWTrace with 0 or set different DWTrace level, default 10,  could be 0|10|20|30|50|70|100

memTraceEnabled.description: Run DWTrace with memtrace enabled, default 0

nvtxBackendEnabled.description: Run DWTrace with nvtxBackend enabled, default 0

fileBackendEnabled.description: Run DWTrace with fileBackendEnabled enabled, default 1

networkBackendEnabled.description: Run DWTrace with networkBackendEnabled enabled, default 0

ftraceBackendEnabled.description: Run DWTrace with with ftrace enabled, default 0

stmControlTracing.description: Run DWTrace with with stm control, default 1

ncuProfileFrames.description: Start/stop the CUDA profiler only for specified frame(s). Pattern: from[-to]

configOverlayFile.description: Path of the Rig2.0 application config overlay .json file. This file contains all the supported configs (M1/M2/...) for RoadRunner-2.0 on each platform variant. It can be either an absolute file path or a path that is relative to recording dataset

configOverlayName.description: The configuration name to use from application config overlay file

calibrationOverlayFile.description: absolute path or relative path to datapath

vinOverlayFile.description: The vin-based static calibration overlay file

virtual.description: 0 for live sensors, 1 for virtual vehicle (without live sensors)

virtual_time.description: Set to use the dw virtual time source

time_multiplier.description: Set to indicate that RR2 is running with DriveSIM with a time multiplier

ds2_control.description: Host and port of the DS2 control server

lockstep.description: Set to indicate that RR2 is running with DriveSIM with lockstep

stm_discriminator.description: Multiple instances of RR: Unique discriminator to launch STM

base_port.description: Base port for running multiple RR instances

instantiate_rig_sensors.description: Set to support RWD recording on DAG disabled sensors

disableParamServiceThread.description: Set to disable param service thread

app_parameter.description: Runtime parameters for CGF product. Json string. Sample: "{"maxFrameCount":50,"fileName":"/tmp/test.log"}

augreplay.description: #ifdef RESIMULATOR_ENABLED - configuration file for augmented data replay

useLCM.description: #ifdef DW_SDK_BUILD_EXPERIMENTAL - true for running RR2 with LCM

sehFailureMask.description: Absolute path of a json file containing failures to not to report to SEH

lockstep_deterministic_replay.description: Enables the new channel based deterministic mode. Currently not supported
